choices: You are tired and must strain yourself to move
1.content: You wake up in a pitch-black room. You try to move.
1.title: Genesis

11.content: You fumble around for a light switch, but instead find a crack of light coming in through the wall. It illuminates you barely, allowing you to see yourself.
11.title: A Crack of Light

choices: You wake him up and ask for help
You lean towards his feet and rub them sloghtly
You lick his feet with your small tounge
111.content: You look across the room and see a 13 year old boy sleeping with size 12 long smooth feet. You go over to him
111.title: You are a Rabbit

1113.content: You stick out your small tongue and gently lap at his sole going from his heel to his arch to his long toes. scrunches his foot up and giggling in his sleep his toes curl but your tongue gets under his toes and licks at them furiously his quiet giggles quickly turn into laughter and feet start to move around trying to avoid your tongue. “Hahahahahahahh stop” he murmured but you continued lapping at his feet. You discovered a spot that was more ticklish than the rest were his heel and arch meet realising this you lick more and faster than you did before. “HahahahahHhahahahahahahah stop” he begged as he jolted awake.
1113.title: You lick his feet with your small tounge

11133.content: “So you were licking me I think I need some revenge” you quickly try to escape.
11133.title: He grabs you.

115.content: You appear to have changed into a red colored lizard and notice that your tongue is now at least two feet in length. There is also something else in the room, and by squinting you can tell that it is a female, but cannot determine what it is. She wakes up and approaches you and you discover that it is ...
115.title: The revalation

12.content: A mirror on the ceiling lights itself. In it, you can barely make out your form.
12.title: Pooped

121.content:
You seem to be a Pikachu. You hear a voice.

"Oh, now you're awake!" The voice says. The voice seems to belong to a female.

"Who are you?" You ask.

The figure reveals to herself as...
121.title: PIKA!

1211.content:
"Hey, I was waiting for you to wake!" The female Pikachu exclaims.

"W-who are you?" You ask.

"I'm just another Pikachu like you here." She exclaims.

"How did you get here anyway?" You ask.

"I don't know..." She says.

"Ughh...I'm so tired...can't move..." you grunt.

Then, suddenly...
1211.title: Pika Pika!

choices: Yes, but I won't tell you.
12111.content:
All of a sudden, a tall young man walks in with a smirk on his face. You gasp. You've seen him before, back before you got kidnapped.
"Falkner?" you think, "What would he want with me?"
He answers your question to no one in general, since he doesn't understand your language, but you can understand him.
"Perfect," he says, "My dream is coming true. Soon, with all the Electric Pokemon out of the way, Bird Pokemon will rise above all species and take over. Now, all I need is to find the location of the Electric shelter in the forest, which I believe this Pikachu knows." He puts a translator in his ear. "Tell me, Pikachu, do you know the whereabouts of the last of the Electric type Pokemon.
You shiver. His plan is diabolical. But the consequences could be horrible. You say...
12111.title: Revenge

122.content:
"wow" you say as you look down to find yourself to be a charmander.
"i never thought charmanders even existed until now"
"realy?"
you know someone else is in the same room.
122.title: CHAR!

1221.content:
"who's there!" you say. but no reply. all of a sudden you are flung to one side.
"ain't you cute, eh?"
a girl chicorita appears out of the dark.
"hey why did you do that!" you yell.
"look at you" she replys, "you gotta tensen down.
again throwing you to one side she laughs.
"that hurt!" you roar at her in rage.
"what... you don't wan't me to hurt you?"

she seems dangerous.
1221.title: an odd pokemon

choices: why don't we tickle fight. it's fair.
12212.content:
"to tickle you silly." she reply's
looking down your still caught in her vine whip.
"l-look i don't think that-."
"-that what" she interupts "you would be so ticklish."
she moves closer and closer tieing you up more with her vines as she does so.
"there cute feet" looking down at them. "i think i might tickle them.
"whah!" you say. legends say charmanders are tough, but when it comes to tickling... not so good.
just as her tounge reaches your sole you yell.
"WAIT A SEC I GOT AN IDEA!"
she looks up. "what?"
12212.title: oh dear

122121.content:
"OK!" she says, her eyes glowing. She locks the door and frees you. She then makes you eat a purple plant, similar in appearance to a carrot. It tastes disgusting, but it fills you with energy.
You both go to either side of the room. "When I say three, we'll start." the Chikorita says. You agree and she begins counting. "1.....2...." she stops. "Is anything the matter?" you ask. "No," she replies, "It's just, I think it would be fairer if you took off you're shoes."
You look down. You're not wearing shoes.
"THREE!" she screams. You look up, but not quick enough, as she once again wraps you in her vines.
"Let's make things interesting," she stalls, "The winner gets to be tickled by the other person for as long as they want. Agreed?" She begins to squeeze the air out of your lungs. Fearing suffocation, you agree. "Alright. This should be fun!" she says, grinning devilishly. Another vine comes out and starts to tickle your...
122121.title: Tickle Fight Begins

122122.content: "I thought so." she said. And she started to use her vine whip and razor leaf. They were tickling his feet and ribs. Once his arms were lifted, they went under his arms too. "Heheheheheh," charmander giggled. He had to escape, but how?
122122.title: ok it's gone.....

1221222.content: He decided to just bare it. she started going for his belly he laughs HAHAHAHANOHAHAHAHAHAT THAHEAHAHARE. It appears your most ticklish spot she replyd and then she
1221222.title: Bear the torture

12212221.content: She begins to tickle your fur covered navel. You giggle. It doesn't tickle as much there. "I guess I've gotta up the anty." she thinks. She turns around and starts to rummage through a round box, while brushing your sides to keep you laughing. You begin to get nervous. Eventually, she turns around, holding a...
12212221.title: Tickles Your Belly Button

choices: In a metal rectangle like restraint
123.content:
You are Experiment 626, Stitch. You get up and stretch a little when you hear a doorknob turning. Not sure that you want them to see you, you head over to a wall and you start to climb up on it. You hide in a small corner in the cieling that is darkened.

Two figures come in, but you can't tell what they are. They look like animal, but no animals that you have ever. One of them looks around the room. "I thought you said that there was something "unique in here"."

The other one looks at him. "There is, he is just hiding." he says as he looks up on the roof. "But he won't be for long."

It isn't until now that you realize just how tired you are, and how hard you are trying to stay awake. Soon, you can't keep your eyes open and you begin to fall asleep.

The next thing you know, you are.........
123.title: You are something blue

1231.content:
In weird type of metal rectangle from what you can see. You ankle and wrists are trapped in it. You try to break out of them, but it doesn't seem to do any good, which is weird as you should be able to easily free yourself considering your strength.

"Oh, looks like he is up." You hear someone say. You turn to see the two from before. Once, you can't tell what they are exactly, but one looks like a bear cub and the other is even harder to distinguish. "Hi, there little guy." You growl at him. "Oh, don't be like that. We're aren't going to hurt."

'Like they could even try' you think. "What do you want?"

The bear creature smiles and suddenly starts to wriggle a finger up and down your right foot. A strange sensation suddenly flows to your brain and you begin to giggle. "See, I told you he would be ticklish." He tickles faster and you start to laugh softly at it.

"Yeah yeah yeah, what should we start with?"

The light tickling stops as they make a decision.
1231.title: Alien in the stocks.

12311.content:
"Well everyone loves a good old feather tickling," the bear creature says. The bear takes out a feather and softly brushes it against the soles of your feet. You begin to giggle. He tickles harder and harder and begins adding pressure. This really tickles now. Then, he stops. He smiles and starts to tickle your sides. This is extremely ticklish. More ticklish than your feet. Your now in that position where your being forced to laugh. He tickles harder and you feel like you can't breathe, but want to laugh more. Then, he stops again. You try to catch your breath. Then he starts tickling your belly. Your practically screaming now.

This goes on for hours, but finally they say, "We'll be back. Don't move." They smile and the other one says, "Like he could. Hehe." They leave.

You decide to
12311.title: A feather

13.content: A blinding light appears from above and you can move your head just enough to see your body. You are a
13.title: Oh Snap!

131.content: You are a Sangheili, a proud member of the Covenant forces. You look down at your big, two toed feet, which are bound together with cuffs and chains. You couldn't help but notice a figure just outside of the light, partially hidden by the shadows. The figure slowly approaches.
131.title: Something with huge feet

132.content: You see your feet are yellow and then someone walks in and shows your face in a mirror and you now your a Pikachu. The one who gave you the mirror is a Hypno and he says now look closley you are under my control. My will is yours. Now you shall be 1000x more ticklish then before. You then feel a sensation that makes you more ticklish. He pokes your belly and you laugh HAHAHAHAHAHAHA. He says this will be fun and with that he tickles your
132.title: Something with tiny feet

choices: "Now for more fun!" He still tickles your parts, but moves the miror so u c him
"I feel bad for you being up there!" He lets you go
His phone rings " I have to go." he leaves you there
1321.content: You see a hand reach at you from behind the mirror. "Tickle, tickle!" He says just to taunt you. You start to squirm. "NOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!! NO PLEASE NOT MY BELLY! ANYWHERE BUT MY BELLY!" You scream, but then remember that you are Pikachu and can not speak human, let alone English. He hears you squeaking and assumes (becauwse he loves to tickle) that you want him to tickle you somewhere other than your belly. He moves his hand up from your belly. You then realize at this point that you are a female Pikachu and you have parts. He tickles you on those parts, "HAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHA HAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHHAHHAHAHAHA HAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAH HAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHA HAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAH AHHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAH AHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAH AHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAH AHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHA HAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHH AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAH HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAH AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAH AHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHHAHHAHAHAHA" You scream. He keeps tickling you and says
1321.title: belly

13213.content:
You sigh in relief, your torturer is finally gone, now at least you can really see who you are, so you look at a nearby mirror to see that you are a female Pikachu, with purple eyes, and a pink bow on your head, along with pink cheeks, instead of the normal red ones that most Pikachu have. "At least I look the same as I always have," you say to yourself, but that's when you saw how you were tied up. You were restrained on a small metal table, with iron restraints holding your arms and legs back on the sides of the table, will there was another 2 iron bar clamping down on your tail, along with another padded iron bar, pushing down on your forehead, and because of that, the only way you can actually see anything OTHER than the ceiling, was because of an Angeld mirror nearby, mounted on the ceiling as well, like whoever kidnapped you wanted to make sure you knew what was going on around you, you also noted that none of the restraints you were actually locked in felt uncomfortable, which thankfully ment that whoever brought you here clearly didn't want you hurt.

As you were trying to find a way out of your restraints, the same person who tickled you before peered back inside your room, he was wearing a hood, so you couldn't see his face, "Oh, I almost forgot," he said walking back in to your room, you yelped, thinking that he was going to tickle you again, you've always absolutely HATED being tickled, especially on your belly, but to your surprise, (and relief,) your captor actually walked to the other side of the room, where he flipped open a hidden door on the wall to reveal some sort of control panel. He flipped a few switches, pressed a button, and than closed the door panel, doing so seemed to cause some sort of machine to start up within the room, signaled by an a quiet, yet odd "wirring" noise suddenly filling the room. "There we go", your captor said almost maliciously, as he started walking to the door, stopping at the foot of you. " I'm guessing you want to know where you are", he said to you, "well all YOU need to know is that you're about a mile down underground, in a completely sound proof room, so don't be afraid to scream when you want to, and WHY you're here is not irrelevant, what IS however relevant, is that this machine is about to start up, and I don't know how long it will be untill this machine will stop, if you're lucky, it will only take about an HOUR, otherwise, it could take all day, so have fun!" , He said almost evily. Worried about what was going to happen, you tried to shock your captor with a thunderbolt, but when you tried, nothing even seemed to have happened, you couldn't even tell if you even DID fire off a thunderbolt to begin with, seeing this, your captor turned back to you, and said, "Oh, and don't try to use any of your attacks on me, that table your on is made of a newly discovered metal, that completely NEGATES all Pokemon moves, so long as your touching that metal, you can basically forget that you knew any Pokemon moves to begin with", He said. Hearing this, only made you feel even MORE helpless than you already were. You captor turned to leave the room, but ton before saying, "Good luck", to you in an evil tone, before leaving the room, and locking the door behind him, "W-wait! What do you mean, "good luck", you worriedly tried to shout back at your captor, but he was already long gone.

NOW you were getting scared, what was going to happen to you? Were you going to be tickled again? But it didn't take long for you to figure it out, as all of a sudden, 2 robotic hands with fingernails appear about a foot above you. "N-NO! PLEASE DON'T!" You screamed in fear, hopping nothing would happen, instead, both hands started to spider tickle the air above you, as they slowly started to decend, in a one-way trip to the middle of your tummy. "NO!!! NONONONONO!!!! PLEASE!!!!! I'LL DO ANYTHING!!! JUST PLEASE!!! ANYWHERE BUT MY TUMMY!!!!!!!!! PLEASE!!!!!!" But it was no use, as the hands decended, you braced for impact, but then, just as the hands were a few inches away from your helplessly ticklish tummy, the hands stopped moving all together. "H-h-huh? Oh thank Arceus!!!!", You said out loud to yourself, thinking your prayers have been answered, so you relaxed a little bit, which was a HUGE mistake, because the second after you relaxed, both of the hands sprang to life, and EMIDEATLY dove into your HYPER ticklish tummy, spider tickling it like it was the end of the world. "NO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHANOHOHOHOHOHOHOSTAH AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAPIHIHIHITHAHAHAHAHAPLEHEHEHEHEHEHEHSEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA THIHIHIHIHIHISIHIHIHIHSTOHOHOHOHORTURE!!!!!!!! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!! !!!!" You can't stop laughing as tears start to fall down your cheeks, you pull on your restraints like your life depended on it, as your most ticklish spot is being put through hell. Seconds feel like minutes, and minutes feel like years, as the tickling when on and on. After about 7 minutes of begging, screaming, crying, and endless laughing, the hands that are torturing you, DOUBLE in speed. TRIPLING your laughter. Now you can't even beg anymore, now all you can do is sob into your own fur, and laugh and laugh and laugh. "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA




You wake up, what feels like DAYS later, and you find yourself...
13213.title: His phone rings " I have to go." he lea...

1322.content: "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" you scream STHHHHHAAAAAAAAAAOP ITTTTTTTTTTTTT PLEHAHAHAHAHAEHEHEHEHEHESEEEE I CANT TAKE IT" "oh ticklish are we" says the hypno teasingly. he then starts using
1322.title: armpits

13223.content: "NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO STHAHAHAAHAOPPPPPPP PLEASE" you plead, but that encorages him even more so you
13223.title: his tounge

14.content: "Ugh..." You say. Why do you have a pounding headache? Doesn't matter... Who am i?
14.title: You stand up

15.content: Feeling around in the darkness, you are apparently lying in an over-sized beanbag chair. A dim light flickers on, which barely allows you to see yourself.
15.title: Mysterious Beanbag Chairs

choices: Tickle the hell out of her
151.content: You are a light-blue Yoshi wearing shiny white boots and a polished saddle. At your eyes adjust to the minimal light, another Yoshi comes into focus directly ahead of you. This Yoshi is pink- probably a girl- and restrained. "Her" arms are crossed behind her head and locked into place, she is kneeling on a velvet pillow, and her ankles are locked into stocks behind her. Listening to the sounds of protests from behind the gag, you decide it is definitely a girl.
151.title: You are not alone

1511.content:
You stare at the nearby wall, a keychain with several keys are there. You quickly grab it, and try several different keys on the locks on her, and eventually find the right ones to free her. You take off the gag, and she smiles at you.

"Thank you so very much!" she says, smiling and hugging you. You blush, and she just smiles wider.

"Unfortunately, I'm afraid our time together is over...." She says, pulling out a remote control button, and pressing it. A hole opens in the floor, right underneath you, and you quickly fall into darkness.

"See ya later..." She says, giving a devious smile as she watches you fall.
1511.title: Sweet Freedom?

15111.content:
You brace yourself for the enevitable, for all you know you might die on impact. You shut your eyes, and eventually hit the ground with a soft plop.

Hold up a minute. Soft plop? You open your eyes to find yourself in a nicely lit room made of a spongey material. Kind of like the ones in the physch wards.

You stare around the room, seeing no exit whatsoever. Suddenly, the room's wall color begins to darken. The yellow fades into orange, then red, then black. The light once pouring into the room is now gone. You then suddenly feel a cold metal hand grab you, and drag you down, and down.
15111.title: The padded room.... of doom?

151111.content:
As the metal hand drags you, and drags you, you suddenly smell something weird. Something very weird.

"OH! Cak....." you say, but as you smell more, your eyes start to droop. You feel quite drowsy, and eventually fall into dreamland...
151111.title: Cake Bomb?

1511111.content:
You wake up after a while, and find yourself in a medium sized room, painted an off white color. Luckily, you aren't harmed. Unfortunately, someone has locked your ankles in a pair of stocks, forced you to kneel down on a pillow, tied your arms behind your back, and gagged you up. "MPPPH! MPPPH!" you say, but what you meant to say was, 'HELP! HELP!'.

"Don't bother, my little victim. You're stuck helplessly." a gruff voice said, evil in his voice.

A figure walked in front of you, and it was none other than Boshi, a somewhat rival of many Yoshi clans.

"So, I'm betting you wanna know why you're tied up and such, eh?" Boshi said, snickering afterwards.

"Mmm. MMPH! MM MMPPPHHH!" you yell, but Boshi just snickers louder, and walks around so he is behind you.

"How just plain lovely..." Boshi said, staring at your light blue, soft feet. "True works of art...." Boshi began salivating somewhat, but then stopped. "Let's test these babies out..."

"Mmph?" you say, not sure about what on Earth Boshi is even talking about.

"Ahh, you'll see." Boshi said, walking towards the back of a room. He quickly opened up a chest, which contained several tickling tools. He quickly picked out a toothbrush, and the classic, a feather duster. "Time for some REAL fun." Boshi said, laughing loudly as he reapproached you from behind.

"Mmmmm! MMMMMM!" you say, wiggling your head around frantically. You don't know what Boshi'll do, but you can't even seem to think it'll be good.
1511111.title: It begins...

choices: Hope he does not tickle for much longer...
15111111.content:
Boshi quickly took off the gag, and began swiping the featherduster across your left foot, and scrubbing at the sole of your right foot.

"YAAAHHHHHHHAHAHAHAHAHAHEHHEHEHEHEHEHEHEE!!!" you screamed, your feet are extremely sensative, considering the fact they were in boots almost all the time.

Boshi was grinning a huge grin while hearing the laughter.

"Oh, you think THIS is ticklish for your little tootsies? This is my slowest pace..." Boshi said devilishly, as he began tickling just a bit faster.

"WOHAHEHEHEHAHAHSTTTAHAHAHAOOPPPPPAHAHAHAHAHA!!!" you screeched. You didn't know if this was hell on Earth or the greatest experience of your life. You were sort of leaning towards the hell part.

"Oh, you want me to stop? HAH. I'll stop when I'm ready." Boshi said, scrubbing the toothbrush inbetween all of your toes, making you laugh even harder. "Let's kick it up a notch, shall we?" Boshi said, stopping the tickling for a moment, only to change tickle weapons.
15111111.title: Frenzy of Fun

151111111.content:
Boshi sifted through the various contents of the chest, until he found a scrub brush for the left foot. Boshi smiled, the tickle weapon for the right foot would be his absolute FAVORITE. He quickly began scrubbing at the left foot, and then he reached out his tongue and began licking the right foot. "OHOHOHOHOHOHMMYYHAHAHAHAHAGOOODDDGHAHAHAHAHA!!" you say, shocked at the fact Boshi was licking his foot. You don't know what could compel him.

Boshi was literally in heaven. He just loved this kind of torture, especially with another Yoshi. He was just infatuated at the perfection, taste, and sensitivity of your feet. After 30 minutes of this, Boshi smiled. "FULL BLAST TIME!" he yelled, grabbing 2 tickle instruments for each hand and beginning to use them, whilst also alternatively licking your right & left foot.

You were in ABSOLUTE HYSTERICS. "YAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" you screeched as loud as you could, breathing between laughs. Boshi just smiled, this was extremely fun for him.

After 3 hours of this megatorture, Boshi finally stopped. "Ah. That was fun." Boshi said devilishly. You, however, were extremely tired.

"Ahh, I'll allow you some rest now. Maybe at a little tootsie fun expense...." Boshi said, unlocking you from the stocks & untying you.
151111111.title: Lick tickles galore..

1511111112.content:
As drowsy as you may be, there is no way in hell you are gonna stick around with Boshi, especially when he has all those tickling tools with him. You spot a camoflauged door, and wait a second. You then get up and sprint for the door.

"WHA?!?! GET BACK HERE NOW!" Boshi says, running after you.

You quickly get to the door, open it, then slam it in Boshi's face. You quickly lock the door afterwards.

Boshi, meanwhile, was trying to get through.

"UNLOCK THIS NOW. YOU'LL BE SORRY! I SWEAR!" Boshi yells, as you quickly observe where you are. A long hallway.

"No way. As if." You say, laughing at him.

"Hmmm. Fine, be that way..." Boshi says to you slyly. Boshi quickly whips out a remote control, and presses a red button on it.

You smile, as you continue down, until you spot a door that has 'K&Y Trials' printed on it.
1511111112.title: Flight...

15111111121.content:
You quickly enter the door, you don't want Boshi to find you if he manages to get into that hall looking for you.

"HEY. YOU. WELCOME TO K&Y TRIALSSS!!!" a voice with a rough Italian accent said. You blinked, and realized you were on a game show stage, standing behing a podium. In front of you was none other than Wario, in his usual WarioWare outfit.

"Wario?" you ask.

"Yeah. I'm-a your host, WARRRIOOOO! Of course, the real reason I'm-a hosting this is for the cold, hard, $10,000 per show! WAHAHAHAHA!!" Wario says, then quickly turning stopping. "Uhhh. Yeah. WELCOME TO K&Y TRIALS! I have no idea what on Earth the K and the Y stand for, but here is the object of this game. You start off with 2, count em, 2 chances to lose, but move on anyways. You have a total of 5 challenges. Complete them all 5, get a WONDERFUL PRIZE! Complete 3 or 4 out of 5, you get a prize anyway! Complete less than 3, something BAD shall happen.... Ahem. So, are you ready? Pick a door!"

You turn around, and see two doors. They each have different letterings on them.
15111111121.title: K&Y Trials, with your host, WAHHHH-RIO!

151111111211.content:
You point at the door that has 'BSB' printed on it.

"I want that door."

"OH-KAY! PREPARE FOR YOUR FIRST CHALLENGE!!! ALTHOUGH I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT ON EARTH IT IS!!" Wario yells, as you enter the door.
151111111211.title: Your fate is now sealed.

1511111112111.content:
The room you enter is blisteringly hot. It looks like you are in a throne room of some sort. It is decorated evilly and austerely, like a torture cell. Right in front of you, sitting on a throne, is the King of the Koopas, Bowser.

"So..... what do we have here...?" Bowser says, looking at you. "A little yoshi? GWAHAHAHAHA! A weak and defenseless little creature, if I do say so myself."

"Hey! Don't call me that!" you say, anger coming into your eyes.

Bowser quickly gets up and grabs you. You strain to get out of his powerful grip, but cannot. "GWAHA! Who's the weakling NOW?!?"

Suddenly, the room starts to fill with a mysterious smoke. "Oh no... NOT AG-" you say, but can't finish, as you pass out, along with Bowser.
1511111112111.title: The Throne Room

15111111121111.content:
You wake up, still in a somewhat drowsy state, in the same throne room. You stand up, look around, until a hand touches you on the back.

"Hey. You're awake! Time for your first challenge." the pink yoshi says, smiling.

You stare at her angrily. "Why did you send me down that hole?"

"Had to. Let's leave it at that. By the way, I'm Marsha." Marsha says, smiling.

You stare at the corner of the room, and see a huge pair of orange soles in stocks. The soles belonged to Bowser, who was still out cold. His ankles were locked in the stocks, his shell taken off and laying on the side, his hands tied behind his back, and he was also gagged.

"So. Yeah. Here is your first challenge. You probably know Bowser by now. Your first challenge is to show me the absolutely most ARTFUL tickling you can. Make it look beautiful, and extremely torturous to the victim." Marsha says, winking. She quickly pointed to a chest containing several tickling mechanisms. "You can use these tools, your hands, your tongue, whatever you want." Marsha says, as she quickly moved over to Bowser's throne, and sits on it. "Well, what are you waiting for, show me some fun." marsha says, giving a compassionate smile.
15111111121111.title: THE 1ST CHALLENGE!

151111111212.content:
You point at the door that has 'WJT' printed on it.

"I want that door."

"OH-KAY! PREPARE FOR YOUR FIRST CHALLENGE!!! ALTHOUGH I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT ON EARTH IT IS!!" Wario yells, as you enter the door.
151111111212.title: You've made your decision.

15111111122.content:
What the heck. Boshi is locked on the other side, so why not wait in the hallway?

You stand there for a moment, and turn around. Boshi is staring at you, grinning devilishly.

"So. You thought you could escape me, huh?" Boshi says, his grin deepening. "Well I... CRAP!"

You stare at Boshi for a second, wondering what is wrong. For some reason, he can't move at all. Nothing except his mouth, as he is grumbling some very unfriendly words at the moment.

"WHAT IS WRONG? WHY CAN'T I MOVE?!?" Boshi yells, anger going through him. You grin, and start to laugh. "Oh no. You better NOT." He yells fearfully.
15111111122.title: A twist.

choices: Wonder what his feet taste like...
151111111221.content:
You walk towards him with an evil smile.

"No no, please don't!" Boshi begged.

"Begging won't help!" You chuckled as you approched his feet.

"NO! NO NO NO NO NO!!!!" Boshi yelled as you wiggled your fingers near his feet.

You grinned evily as you scribbled your fingers up and down his feet.

"NAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!! PLEHEHEHEHEHSE STAHAHAHAHAHAHAP!!! NAHAHAHAHAHA!!!" Boshi squealed with laughter.

"Hmmm...." You think. "Nope!" as you tickled in between his toes.

"OHOHOHOHOHOHOHOGAHAHAHAHAHAHAHD THIHIHIHIHIHIHS IHIHIHIHS TOHOHOHOHOHTURE AHAHAHAHAHAHA!!" Boshi laughed with tears in his eyes. You decided to...
151111111221.title: Heheheh....

choices: A feather falls in your hand!
1511111112212.content:
"Hey Boshi," You ask, stopping your tickling. For now.

"What?" Boshi asked, panting.

"I wonder what your feet taste like?"

Boshi's eyes widen. "NO! NO! Don't find out!"

"I wonder if they're sweet..." You wonder, teasing him.

"Come on dude! Don't do this!" He begs.

You give Boshi's feet a solid lick.

Boshi EXPLODES with laughter! "AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!! NOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO! DOHOHOHOHOHOHN'T IHIHIHIHI'M BEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEGING YOUHOHOHOHOHOHO AHAHAHAHAHA!!!!"

You keep licking, when
1511111112212.title: Wonder what his feet taste like...

choices: Awww...I'll let you free little Yoshi! :D
...Fine, but only if she promises to be nice.
NO IMMA TICKLE HER! >:) I LIEK TO SEE HER SQUIRM!
1512.content: How could you tickle such an innocent Yoshi? She's so cute! Shame on youuuu >:C
1512.title: ...Really? :C

choices: Angry...how DARE she betray me? *Gets Feather*
Miserable...I really wanted to be friends and now this? :C
15121.content:
So you let the cute Yoshi free! She snuggles and hugs you.
"Thank you so much, my lovely cutie pie... Alas, we must part now...See ya later. *Pulls Leever and a trap door falls through, but you aren't standing on it* WHAT? This wasn't supposed to happen!!!"
You feel...
15121.title: Awww...I'll let you free little Yoshi! :D

choices: You hear someone running towards the door
151212.content:
"Ihatethisjobsomuch..." She mumbles?
"Job?" You say quietly.
"Sorry about that, guy. You see, Mister Tortellini thinks I have some information about some stupid commode, and he tried to tickle it out of me. I admit I'm awfully ticklish, but I have no secrets relating to his concern. I swear! Isn't that terrible? Are YOU ticklish? I betchya are, Mister Squishy!" She said, likely poking fun at your slight chubbiness. However, she was probably a bit chubbier. You noticed she wore boring white socks without shoes. "Hey...what happenned to your shoes?" you asked. She got a bit emotional now. "Yeah...so I had to get that mean guy to stop, so I begged to join his side, The Dark Side. He said he would stop tickling me for a few hours if I took this job. As much as I hate being evil, I agreed. He said there's no escape possible...but hey, nothing's impossible, right? It must be pretty darn close, though. So far, I haven't seen anyone but you. I haven't even tricked you, and I'm glad I didn't. You're so cute and kind. I don't think I could live with myself if I did. You see, that trap door leads to a terrible place that 'Nobody' can escape from..." She trailed off for awhile.
LATER
".....
.....
..... ...... ......
.....
.....Oh, right, the socks. See, he left right before deciding to take my socks off as well as my shoes, which is good, because if having my paws tickled with socks on is THAT bad... ....Well, I can't imagine it...Anyway, now I'm a prisoner of war! SCREW THIS JOB! *She pulled out the leever and threw it at the door* I love you very much and we shall stick together. *She gives you a warm, cuddly friendly hug* YAY THE YORHI GIRL JOINED YOUR PARTY!
151212.title: Miserable...I really wanted to be friends and n...

choices: Snuggle together and take an overdue nap.
1512122.content:
As shy of a Yoshi you are, you both kiss and blush. "Teehee, that tickles. (Wait, even kissing tickles her? She doesn't lie about being ticklish ;D) So enough about me, what about you?
"Well...um...I don't know where the heck I am. I just randomly woke up here. And I hate everything here except you...and it's stupid." you reply honestly. "Well, Same here. I don't know why this sort of stuff happens, are our lives dead to use? I always wish there was more than 2 choices after every chapter!" "Hmm looks like you just broke the fourth wall!" You both laughed and talked about how much you hated the place...to bad it's only the beggining of a tale of Terror, Action, Woe, Lying, Stealing, Cheating, Friendship, Pity, Caring, Strategy, Sympathy, Love- and not to forget- tickling, but for now, the two of you...
1512122.title: You kiss her :D

152.content: You are Ord, the big blue dragon. The light turns all the way on now, allowing you to see the room. The walls are covered in somewhat tasteful wallpaper with wood everywhere. The octagonal room is about twice as wide as you are tall, and several paintings poorly conceal video cameras. There are no doors and there are no windows.
152.title: Why does this stuff always happen to you?

1521.content:
"Oooooord!" bellows some disembodied voice. "You have been selected! Are you ready to play Tickle T.V.?!"

"Whaaaa..?"

"The game show broadcast in over 80 countries, with over four hundred MILLION viewers each week. Why? Because YOU could win a cash prize of over TWENTY MILLION DOLLARS!!"

"Are YOU ready to PLAY??"
1521.title: A game?

15211.content:
"For twenty million? What do I have to do?"

"Pick a room!"

Without a second's hesitation, two wall panels slide away to reveal doors labeled "A" and "B".
15211.title: Go for the show!

152112.content: You point to the door labeled B. "Alright! And we begin...,"
152112.title: This one?

154.content: A door is squeaked open, letting in natural light. A figure walks into the room; after yours eyes adjust, you realize it is a brownish fox who reminds you vaguely of Krystal. "Are you comfortable?" she asks simply. You nod, although confused about the circumstances. "Do you want me to do anything before it starts?"
154.title: A fox walks in

1541.content:
"Yeah, yeah I do."

"Do you want to do something to me, or vice-versa?" She talks as if this is a Tuesday and nothing more.
1541.title: Go along for the Ride

info.brief_description: Expect mostly non-human fictional characters and then tickle them.
info.description: Here we go, kids! I set up a story, and you knock it down. Remember, tickling is the point. Try to keep it somewhat clean. Add as many chapters as you want, and then a few more!
